mapper.select: SELECT M.HOUSE_NO AS houseNo, M.MYHOUSE_NO AS myhouseNo, M.NICKNAME AS nickname, M.MYHOUSE_TITLE AS myhouseTitle, M.MYHOUSE_CONTENT AS myhouseContent, M.MYHOUSE_REGDATE AS regDate, M.MYHOUSE_HIT AS hit, M.PRICE AS price, F.FILE_NO AS fileNo, F.MYHOUSE_FILENAME AS fileName, F.MYHOUSE_IMG_URL AS myhouseImgUrl FROM `NOTICE_MYHOUSE` AS M LEFT OUTER JOIN `FILE_MYHOUSE` AS F ON M.HOUSE_NO = f.house_no AND m.myhouse_category = f.myhouse_category AND m.myhouse_no = f.myhouse_no WHERE m.MYHOUSE_CATEGORY = 'm' AND m.HOUSE_NO = #{houseNo} AND f.File_NO = 1

SELECT M.HOUSE_NO AS houseNo, M.MYHOUSE_NO AS myhouseNo, M.MYHOUSE_TITLE AS myhouseTitle, M.MYHOUSE_CONTENT AS myhouseContent, M.MYHOUSE_REGDATE AS regDate, M.MYHOUSE_HIT AS hit, M.PRICE AS price, F.FILE_NO AS fileNo, F.MYHOUSE_FILENAME AS fileName, F.MYHOUSE_IMG_URL AS myhouseImgUrl FROM `NOTICE_MYHOUSE` AS M LEFT OUTER JOIN `FILE_MYHOUSE` AS F ON M.HOUSE_NO = f.house_no AND m.myhouse_category = f.myhouse_category AND m.myhouse_no = f.myhouse_no WHERE m.MYHOUSE_CATEGORY = 'm' AND m.HOUSE_NO = #{houseNo} AND m.myhouse_no = #{myhouseNo}
